page.description: Set the state of a control to either enabled or disabled.

argument.name: UXControlName
argument.description: The control to enable or disable. Can be a single control specified as a string or an array of controls.

argument.name: flag
argument.description: Optional true/false value. Default value is *[js:true]*. If *[js:true]*, control will be disabled. If *[js:false]*, control will be enabled.

page.discussion: The optional *[js:flag]* argument controls whether the state is set to disabled or enabled. You can optionally pass in an array of controls to set.
